New Canaan Branch, Substitute Busing, Fri. Jan 27 - Sun. Jan 29, 2017

Rockville Centre Elevator Out-of-Service Today & Tomorrow

A fire alarm installation project is now underway at the RVC Station. To accommodate the work, the RVC elevator will be out-of-service for 48 hours today through tomorrow. During this time, mobility impaired customers may wish to use the Baldwin or Lynbrook Stations, which are equipped with elevators. The RVC elevator will return to service Thursday, January 12 from 6 AM to 7:30 PM. For the remainder of the month, the elevator will be shut down overnight.

Temporary Rockville Centre Elevator & Waiting Room Closures Begin Monday night

Starting tomorrow, Monday, January 9, a fire alarm installation project will begin at the RVC Station. To accommodate the work, the RVC elevator will be shut down for 48 hours on January 10 & 11. For the remainder of the month, the elevator will be shut down overnight and station waiting room closed between 7:30 PM and 6:00 AM. During this time, mobility impaired customers may wish to consider using the Baldwin or Lynbrook Stations, which are equipped with elevators.

Alcohol Ban on Trains & at Stations New Year's Eve/Day

Drinking alcohol on Metro-North trains and at our stations is banned from noon New Year's Eve until noon New Year's Day. MTA police officers will be on duty at Grand Central Terminal and stations throughout the region, as well as on trains to enforce this restriction. The police will confiscate alcoholic beverages and issue summonses carrying fines or imprisonment. Violators may also be subject to removal from the train or station by police. View: http://n.v12.net/m?5E65F View: http://n.v12.net/m?5E6CA

On New Year's Day, Sunday, January 1, 2017 we will operate a Sunday schedule. Because businesses and government offices are closed on Monday, January 2, in official observance of New Year's Day, we will operate a Saturday schedule on Monday without the Shoppers Specials. Please remember that drinking alcohol on Metro-North trains and at our stations is banned from noon New Year's Eve until noon New Year's Day.
